text:
TF Value-Mart is a chain
hypermarket in Malaysia,

which we have operating 41 outlets
across the Peninsular Malaysia.

We supply fresh produce, grocery
products, and general merchandise
to our consumers.

Being a retailer, we are always conscious
about the expenses.

We always want to keep the low cost
so that we will be

competitive in the market
with other retailers.
By hosting the cloud server at AWS,

it helps us to reduce
the operating costs in IT departments.

If we were to manage the
servers ourself, we have to
implement the high cost

in terms of human resource
and infrastructure.

We cannot afford to set up and maintain
a huge IT team in our HQ.

We need an IT
structure that can provide the scalability

and flexibility
to support our business daily operations.

We migrated from
another service provider to AWS Cloud.

By using AWS Cloud, we can
approximately save 35% of the cost.

The AWS Cloud architecture
seems to be able

to scale seamlessly
to support the growth of our business,
and provide no downtime, and a very smooth

experience for my user
when they are using the applications.
